title: Popeye the Sailor Meets Ali Baba's Forty Thieves

sources.title: Popeye the Sailor Meets Ali Baba's Forty Thieves (1937)
sources.description: Popeye the Sailor, accompanied by Olive Oyl and Wimpy, is dispatched to stop the dreaded bandit Abu Hassan and his force of forty thieves. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/popeye-the-sailor-meets-ali-babas-forty-thieves-1937/

metadata.Plot: Upon hearing of the evil deeds of the bandit Abu Hassan, Popeye, accompanied by Olive Oyl and J. Wellington Wimpy, flies to Arabia. Olive is kidnapped by Abu Hassan, who forces her to do the laundry for his Forty Thieves. Popeye sneaks into their hideout to rescue her, but finds himself outnumbered forty-one to one.
metadata.Writer: Seymour Kneitel, Izzy Sparber, Bill Turner
metadata.Actors: Jack Mercer, Mae Questel, Lou Fleischer
